abstract: Remarkable editorial published by French newspaper Le Monde on 200-year anniversary of Waterloo urges Great Britain to not exit European Union, signalling how troubling such an exit would be for other member countries.
lead_paragraph: In an unusual step, an editorial in Le Monde said Napoleon’s defeat 200 years ago offered a lesson on European unity and its peaceful rewards.

headline.main: In English, French Paper Urges Britain to Heed Waterloo and Stay in E.U.
headline.print_headline: Appeal From France to Britain: Stay in E.U.

snippet: In an unusual step, an editorial in Le Monde said Napoleon’s defeat 200 years ago offered a lesson on European unity and its peaceful rewards.
